DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose prospective , longitudinal , department fund study protocol evaluate whether change energy availability , period highly intensified exercise training , increase bone turnover marker decrease ovarian function exercise performance , dose-dependent fashion competitive female athlete .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intense Training Ovarian Function Bone Turnover
DOC.detailed_description: Female athletes participate sport emphasize leanness factor success , also impose large exercise training load , present high prevalence endocrine metabolic alteration link low energy store , include suppressed ovarian function bone loss . Increased bone turnover result low energy store suppress estrogen production may hold adverse consequence long term health , increase risk premature osteopenia , increase risk stress fracture short term . Chronically low energy store may also contribute development overreach overtraining syndrome , characterize excessive , lasting fatigue long-term decrease performance , compromise athlete ' health athletic career . The investigator propose first longitudinal study aim demonstrate link low energy status , impaired ovarian function , bone turnover decrease performance free-living , competitive female athlete . After 4-week baseline period habitual training , athletes undergo 4 week intensified training ( IT ) , exercise load increase 30 % individual baseline load order sharply increase energy expenditure . As athlete let freely adjust food intake , investigator aim test hypothesis athlete fail adjust food intake sufficiently match energy expenditure , result decrease energy availability ( EA , energy intake - energy expenditure exercise ) influence , dose-dependent fashion , suppression estrogen production , increase bone turnover severity performance decrement . The IT period follow 2-week taper ( REC ) , exercise training volume reduce 50 % baseline . The investigator assess whether EA return baseline value , characterize change bone turnover recovery period . It hypothesize improvement exercise performance result IT + REC occur athletes able remain close balance energy state IT . Concretely link EA performance bone health may incentivize female athlete adopt adequate feeding behavior activity level .
DOC.criteria: competitive endurance runner ( race event range 10km ultramarathons ) train least 5 day per week past 12 month , 30 mile per week regular menstrual cycle ( 2435 day ) past 6 month maximal oxygen consumption ( VO2max ) > 50ml/kg/min English speaking smoker amenorrhea pregnant lactating past 2 year chronic disease affect bone health , metabolism cardiorespiratory system take medication cardiovascular metabolic effect present contraindication exercise testing ( cardiovascular abnormality ) report major illness injury prevent train 4 week past 3 month history clinical anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa
